test.InteractiveConsoleTest

  • Packages that use InteractiveConsoleTest 
    Package Description
    final1.subtests
    The actual tests for the programming lecture's final task.
    sheet5.b_cities
    Tests for Sheet 5 Task B: Storing cities' number of inhabitants.
    sheet5.c_books
    Tests for Sheet 5 Task C: Index of words in a book.
    sheet6.a_books
    Tests for Sheet 6 Task A: Search with keywords for the pages in a book, where the keyword appeares.
    sheet6.c_bookDatabase.subtests
    The actual tests for BookDatabaseTest.
